name: Unovis
title: unovis.dev
shortDescription: Unovis is a versatile data visualization framework designed for developers using popular web technologies. It supports frameworks like React, Angular, Svelte, Vue, Solid, and can also be used with vanilla JavaScript or TypeScript. This tool is ideal for developers looking to integrate customizable, responsive data visualization components into their applications. An example use case could be a web developer creating an interactive dashboard for real-time data analysis.
cons: Requires familiarity with modern JS frameworks
May have a learning curve for beginners
Limited community compared to larger frameworks
